feed.title: SAP Community - BW Business Explorer (SAP BEx)
feed.subtitle: BW Business Explorer (SAP BEx) Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Enhance Standard CDS view I_AugmentedPhysInvtryDocItem for Fiori- Physical Inventory Analysis
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I have a requirement to add custom movement types to an existing fiori app - Physical Inventory Analysis that displays only 701 and 702 at the moment.

This App uses BEx query with data source I_PhysInvtryCube, this CDS view has another CDS view as data source I_AugmentedPhysInvtryDocItem.

Inside this CDS view, I found a CASE statement that restricts the movement types, now I want to change this CASE statement, can you help me how to achieve this.

I am looking at Custom Fields and Logic app to enhance this CDS view, but unable to find the business context. Is there a way to enhance the logic of this CDS view without creating a NEW CDS view.

Appreciate any help!

@ObjectModel.foreignKey.association: '_GoodsMovementType'

cast((case when Quantity > BookQtyBfrCountInMatlBaseUnit and PhysicalInventoryItemIsCounted = 'X'

then _AdjmtPostingMovementType.PhysInvtryIncreasingQtyMvtType

else case when Quantity < BookQtyBfrCountInMatlBaseUnit and PhysicalInventoryItemIsCounted = 'X'

then _AdjmtPostingMovementType.PhysInvtryDecreasingQtyMvtType

else ''

end

end) as pi_bwart preserving type) as GoodsMovementType,

entry.title: How to display custom Message in RSRT and AO until valid input is given
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have implemented BADI for customer exit variables - calling external program to implement form - endform. I need to display a Message in RSRT and AO [Analysis for Office] until valid currency type value is given as input. It should allow to enter correct currency type value if wrong input is provided

In the called external called program in Form - endform - under i_step =3 , i have implemented the following code to display message. But I need to display my own custom message.

TRY.
IF lv_return_msg IS NOT INITIAL.
RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE cx_rs_error_with_message
* MESSAGE ID 'BRAIN' TYPE 'W' NUMBER '655' WITH 'Enter Currency Type --> 30 '.
exporting
msgid = 'BRAIN'
msgno = '642'
msgty = sy-msgty
attribute_msgv1 = 'Currency Type.'.
ENDIF. " lv_return_msg IS NOT INITIAL.
CATCH cx_rs_error_with_message.
MESSAGE ID 'BRAIN' TYPE 'W' NUMBER '642' WITH ' Currency Type.'.
ENDTRY.

Please suggest me , is there any class available to display message (in both RSRT and AO) until valid currency type value is provided.

Thanks
kv

entry.title: Reactivating Archived Equipment / Asset – Is it possibility Through Enhancement ?
entry.content:
Is it possible to reactivate equipment once it has been archived in SAP S/4HANA? 

Can anyone confirm if there is any standard approach or enhancement available to achieve this? Additionally, are there any SAP Help Portal or SAP Learning articles that provide insights into handling such cases?

Looking forward to expert guidance on this topic.

entry.title: How does a Content Delivery Network (CDN) enhance application performance and user experience?
entry.content:
Hello,
A CDN improves performance by caching and delivering content from edge servers located near users, reducing latency. It decreases server load and accelerates website speed, benefiting applications with global audiences. Employ tools like Cloudflare or Akamai for robust CDN solutions. Adaptive caching strategies further optimize performance, while security features like DDoS protection enhance reliability. By leveraging a CDN, businesses provide faster, more reliable experiences, ensuring greater customer satisfaction and retention. eztag org

Best Regards,
Jacob Small

entry.title: User authorization is not working in BEX Query
entry.content:
Hello Experts, 

We are using an authorization object to execute the query, which should restrict data visibility to a specific company code. However, it is currently displaying data for all company codes.

Could you please check and assist in resolving this issue,

entry.title: Universal Display Hierarchy - Display values on all hierarchy nodes/levels
entry.content:
Hi Folks,

we want to use the UDH for combining two charateristics.

Issue we see ist that only values are displayed when the hierarchy is expaned to the second characteristic but no values on the parent nodes/first charateristic when not expanded.

So in the example of 
Screen Area: Universal Display Hierarchy | SAP Help Portal

We want value also at country level -> yellow mark (especially when not expanded to city level).

What kind of setting is needed for that?
In other queries (that use UDH) it is showing values on all UDH levels.

Thanks for all replies in advance!

Best regards

Axel

entry.title: how to delete Bex query (meta info screwed up...)
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I wanted copy a query elements to unmatched structure ( some infoobjects are not in  )

I find the blog (https://medium.com/@mony.maheshsingh/force-copy-queries-from-one-info-provider-to-another-with-different-structure-fb615451d48f)

and followed the instruction ( To make Force Copy Program ).

And... the side effects occurred...

Two same (compuid info is also same) query object are absent in two different Info Cube...

I wanted to copy it with changing the quey and it's restricted keyfigure's name... 

As the two objects meta info are same... , i cannot delete it (last one)..

 

help me...

entry.title: How to show post value based F4 help with Calculation view?
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

 

We want to show post value based F4 help on Composite Provider which has Calculation view  as one of infoprovider.

But, There is no option without Master data value. (if CP consist of ADSO only, there is post value option. )

Using CL_PBW_VARIABLE_F4_RESTRIC class give bypass option... but i treat it as last resort..

Cause it is hard to implement a common customer exit variable...

entry.title: Analysis for Microsoft Office compatible with Microsoft Office 2024
entry.content:
Dear BW Experts,

The SAP packages listed below are currently not compatible with Microsoft Office 2024.

  1. SAP Analysis for Microsoft Office
  2. SAP BusinessObjects EPM addin for MS office Client
  3. SAP BusinessObjects Live Office
  4. SAP BW Business Explorer - for SAP GUI 8.0

The above components are working fine when users are using Microsoft office 2016. After migrating to Microsoft Office 2024, the above applications are not working. Could you please guide me or share what are the required steps we need to perform to make the above applications to work.

Thanks.

entry.title: ADSO's and Composite Providers are not visible in Analysis
entry.content:
Hello.

When I connect to the BW4Hana server with Analysis, I can only see the queries but not the ADSOs or Composite Providers. Sometimes I need to use them to see the raw data other than the query. Does anyone know how to make ADSOs and Composite Providers visible in Analysis?

Thank you.

entry.title: Exception aggregation behaves differently
entry.content:
Hey Guys, 

I use exception aggregation regulary but  now I met a strange example and I am wondering if someone could explain me how it has happened. 

I have a data mart adso with the data:

0CALMONTH   Material  Plant   GUID     Tool life
202505                1                 10     $sad         200
202505                1                 10     $DAD       200

I wanted to make exception aggregation on tool life . Because for each month I wanted to show the average of value. 

When I set exception aggregation on 0CALMONTH sadly it has calculated 400 for tool life instead / CALMONTH so it did not work as I wanted. What strange for me is that when I set the exception aggregation based on guid it worked as I wanted it only show  values for each month once. 

But I am not sure why it works like that. It behaved totally the opposite that I am used to .
Could you explain Why I need to set the reference on guid  so it calculate the monthly last value for each material ? 
I understand it that because this is the only value that differ on row level but for the concept of exception aggregation it behaves totally the opposite I would expect it to work

entry.title: Retrieve the name of a restricted key figure in a customer exit variable?
entry.content:
Hello,

does anybody knows if it's possible, in a customer exit variable used to restrict values on an infoobject in a restricted key figure, to get the technical name of the restricted key figure?

The idea is to read from another table the value to restrict according to the name of the restricted key figure...

 

Restricted key figure nameCompany Code
RESTRICTED_KEY_FIGURE_14711
RESTRICTED_KEY_FIGURE_24712

If this is possible I could always use the same variable in different restricted key figure...

RESTRICTED_KEY_FIGURE_1 should read in the tbale the filter on company code = 4711

RESTRICTED_KEY_FIGURE_2 should read in the tbale the filter on company code = 4712

Thanks!

BR,

Gilles

entry.title: How to test dozens of new roles for BW ?
entry.content:
Hello,

we created 74 new roles for BW (37 end users and 37 Key users with the same autorisations + the capacity to create/handle queries and workbooks).

These roles should give access only for certain providers and only for certain plants.

We filter the plants with a filter structure in Bex Query Designer.

 

We created 74 test users, each one with one role.

We have very few queries in DEV system.

 

In order to test if the role work as intended, do I really have to create a query for every single provider we have and then make sure that the test users have access only to the right queries and only to the data for their plant using Analysis??

 

Is there a faster way to test as we have dozens of providers?

 

thanks.

Loïc

entry.title: Request: Where-Used List for HANA Views & BEx Queries in SAC Models/Stories
entry.content: How can I generate a comprehensive Where-Used list of HANA views and BEx queries that are being utilized in existing SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) models and stories, to ensure impact analysis before making changes to the underlying data sources?

entry.title: SAP BW ANALYSIS
entry.content:
Hello,

End users have saved locally Excel workbooks containing Analysis for Office (AO) reports.
Since then, the underlying BEx query has been modified (fields added/removed, filters changed, etc.).

However, when users open their files, these changes are not reflected.
We would like to update the BW query data source in the AO workbooks while preserving the existing Excel formatting.

Goal:
Ensure the updated versions of the BEx queries are applied to locally saved AO files, without breaking the layout or formatting.

entry.title: Need Help Setting Up SAP BTP – Feeling Stuck
entry.content:
Hi all,

I have  started exploring SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) & while the possibilities seem exciting, I am  facing issue when it comes to the setup part. I have been trying to work through the trial account and get things going with SAP Build Apps & Cloud Foundry but I keep getting confused around role collections, entitlements & service configurations.

I have followed a few guides but either I am missing a step or things have changed from what is shown. Coming from a DevOps background, I am used to tools such as Atlassian. I just finished jira training last month & compared to that, SAP’s environment feels a bit more complex to navigate.

If anyone here could share how they got started with SAP BTP or suggest any beginner-friendly resources or videos, I would be  grateful. Even a checklist of key steps would help a ton.

Appreciate any help.

Thank you....:)

entry.title: BEx Web Application Error while loading the application (return value "4")
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

We have this issue in production portal where, when users run the WAD reports they are getting error "BEx Web Application Error while loading the application "" (return value "4")

The issue is intermittent and is seen only against the WAD reports.

entry.title: how to send the data as excel attachment via email in sap bw on hana
entry.content:
Hello All,

I've requirement where user need a data as an excel format and send via email to vendor (broadcast). In attachment data should be vendor specific if file contain that vendor data should be go to that vendor only with subject line of vendor and date of data.
